favorites.text: ✨ **Fantasy:** a ghost who doesn't know they're dead in a theater that only shows forbidden plays, but they start speaking a language no one knows. Magic has unexpected costs.
favorites.character: a ghost who doesn't know they're dead
favorites.setting: in a theater that only shows forbidden plays
favorites.conflict: they start speaking a language no one knows

favorites.text: 🚀 **Sci-Fi:** a gardener who grows emotions as plants in a library where books rewrite themselves, but they receive letters from their future self. Technology rebels against its creators.
favorites.character: a gardener who grows emotions as plants
favorites.setting: in a library where books rewrite themselves
favorites.conflict: they receive letters from their future self
